## 0.0.3 - August1 6, 2012

- [#2][]: Inform the user about unwatchable directories.
- Correctly handle UNC when converting to an extended-length path.

## 0.0.2 - July 24, 2012

- Fix a crash that happened sometimes while more than one monitor
was running.

## 0.0.1 - July 22, 2012

- Initial release.
